title: Microphone speaking
brief_description: Teaches the proper use of microphones in public address systems and radio. The microphone can be a help or a hindrance, depending upon how the speaker uses it. How would Lincoln’s Gettysburg Address have gone over if he had been constantly interrupted by feedback?
